description:
Misaki`s classmate, Ryo Misaki claims that girls can`t beat boys at Angelic Layer if the fight is "fair". Eventually they end up having a match.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Misaki Vs Misaki?! Um Perigoso Colega De Classe!
Misaki contre Misaki. Une camarade dangereuse.
Misaki gegen Misaki - Ein gefährlicher Mitschüler
Misaki vs Misaki? Kiken na Classmate
Misaki vs Misaki? The Dangerous Classmate
みさき vs ミサキ? 危険な同級生[クラスメイト]
